name: Mini Star Cafe
description:
Mini Star Cafe is a Simple relaxing game that expands the store by making and selling Coffee & bread.

Features

  • Simple making system
  • 100 Bread Recipes
  • 100 Coffee Recipes
  • Upgrades and floor expansion elements
  • Beautiful and intensely colored visuals
  • Comfortable and relaxing OST
  • 10~12 hours of playtime
